attributes.action: GIVE POLICE POWERS TO ENFORCE CONTACT ORDERS IN RELATION TO CHILDREN AN FATHERS
attributes.additional_details: I AM A THE RESULT OF HAVING NO FATHER IN MY LIFE AN HAVE WENT DOWN THE WRONG PATH IN LIFE. I AM 💯 NOT PROUD OF THAT. HOWEVER I CAN GURANTEE IF I HAD A FATHER IN MY LIFE I WOULDNT OF TURNED OUT TO BE THE PERSON I AM TODAY ALOT OF FATHERS ARE IN THE SAME PLACE AS ME AN WANT TO BE THERE FOR OUR CHILDREN AN GO DOWN THE RIGHT CHANNELS TO GET CONTACT ORDERS WHICH WAS WAS GRANTED. HOWEVER WHEN THESE ORDERS ARE BREACHED AGAINST US THEY IS NO HELP. BY THE POLICE LIKE THEY IS ON NONE MOLESTATION ORDERS
attributes.background: GIVE POLICE MORE POWERS. TO ENFORCE BREACHES ON CONTACT ORDERS MADE IN FAMILY COURTS IN RELATION TO CHILDREN.LIKE THEY HAVE POWERS TO ENFORCE BREACHES ON NONE MOLESTATION ORDERS AN OTHER ORDERS MADE IN THE SAME COURT.IN RELATION TO CHILDREN. AS ABSENT FATHERS HAVE A HUGE IMPACT ON CHILDREN'S LIFES.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Make breach of any court order a criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590496
